I would never recommend this game to my friends ever. Just because its the best in its asymmetrical genre doesn't mean its actually good. Worse than Amber Heard's lawyers, Worse than House of Cards Season 6, Worse than trans fat, Worse than Burger King, Worse than a 2000's model yellow Corvette. I really tried to make all of these things work but Dead by Daylight disappoints harder than a high school drop out taking online courses. Its like biting into a BLT sandwich but only getting the bread and tomato. I would sooner get my blood drawn for no reason than to play this game. Donating plasma is more fun.

Its really fun if you like to watch horror movies and you like the killers then you may like this game.

If u are a Solo player, I dont recommend this game (unless u start with Killer). This new patch is extremely awful for Survivor players. While I welcome meta shake-ups (new meta changes) but this patch really Over-nerfed Survivors and Over-buffed Killers. The fun part about Killer is that u will NEVER be punished regardless if u missed hit, missed your power, unable to catch Survivors because you have Bloodlust & other catch-up mechanics to help u. Killers can also put end game build to get free easy kills. Developers encourages Toxic Killers and allows you to camp/tunnel/camp near hook your preys until they can completely out of the game. Just imagine when you are the Survivor, it is not fun at all. Additionally there are many Killer bugs that Dev doesnt want to fix so it is great for Killers BUT the moment they found out a Survivor bug, it will be fixed in no time. To be considered decent Survivor, you need at least 2-3k hours of gameplay and if u wanna be great, probably 6-7k hours and that is provided YOU have the brains. Survivors are not incentivised for most of their gameplay & most of the time, u get facecamped, camp near hook or tunnel. As a new player/average player, u wait 5mins for a game and if u are unlucky, u died within 1min, your chase could last 10 or 30secs. if u cant loop them well, so your interaction is super limited. So do your math to reach a 'decent' player skill. Therefore this game is no longer considered 'fun and casual'. Quit the game because SOLO Q is too awful.

Tons of different characters and abilities you can play. And, if you decide to take a break from playing survivor, playing as the killer is fun too! Plenty of options and customize able features to make it perfect for you.

The developers refuse to fix camping and actually support it. not fun to play when entire aspects are removed because every killer camps. why even have benevolent, Teamwork for saving and healing, when you cant do it.

Also killers will tunnel you and camp your hook for breaking a totem, part of the game to help you live, because they are crybaby campers who are upset you broke something. I would not recommend buying this game till the developers take a hard look in the mirror and realize they need to fix their game.

Bu oyun LoL'den Kanser yemin ederim bu kadar adi bu kadar şerefsiz insanları başka oyunlar da ne gördüm ne duydum. Bu oyunda Sapık ruhlu katiller var adam ciddi bağlamda psikolojik sorunlarını oyuna yansıtarak oynuyor. Bütün oyun boyunca katile loop attırıp takım arkadaşlarınızın jeneratörleri bitirmesini mi sağladınız? Ee sonra noluyor biliyor musunuz ? Akıl hastanesinden kaçıp evde pc başında dbd oynayan katil sizi sonunda yakalayıp asıyor. Tamam diyeceksiniz assın takım arkadaşlarım var. Onlarda ayrı ruh hastaları gelipo kurtarıp üstünüze palet düşürüp ölmenizi izleyip katile kafa sallayıp kaçıyorlar. Prelerle gir diyeceksiniz. Giriyoruz bu sefer sapık katil + ruh hastası kurban ihtimali yüzde 200'e çıkıyor. Oyunu oynamaya devam edeceğim ama yeni başlayacaksanız akıl sağlığınız için bu 2 şişman paragöz köpeğin oyununu salın boşverin. 5.7.0 yamasıyla bu kadar leş bir katil ve kurban kitlesini 4 ay önceye kadar görmemiştim. Tamamiylen leş berbat. MMR sistemi değiştikten sonra oyun o kadar kötü oldu ki anlatamam.

I have so many great memories of Dead by Daylight...
but after witnessing the way the creators & owners treat its game.. the way it changed matchmaking.. the way it treats their community.. I have to say this game is slowly but surely dying.. They need to fix a lot of aspects before people will come back to this game. 

Big major issues: 
- the way the devs respond to criticism (I did not like the way they've responded to Dowsey.. it makes them childish & unprofessional.. what kind of company refuse to listen to its criticism & only take in the positive comments? how can they improve? how can they get their community back?
- rank system.. match making.. it really needs to be fixed.. why am I getting paired with red ranks.. when I am a silver level killer? how am I suppose to rank up? on the other hand, I've experienced my red rank killers getting bronze to silver survivors.. 
- Cheaters.. they are still a big issue... it needs to be fixed.. maybe fix the monitoring system or let us record match history via the game? I know it is impossible to be completely free from cheaters.. but I feel the devs have been very slow or lackluster in dealing with this issue
- Toxic gamer's.. for this I don't understand why people are just getting more toxic everyday? is this because of the community? is there an in-balance between survivors & killer mains? I know this is something tough to change.. but I was wondering how did we end up like this? why is this the norm now? 

Overall, I still recommend this game to other people,
DBD is a great game where we survivors work together to escape the killer,
I've made so many friends through this game & I've even started a community solely on DBD, 
However, I still miss the good old days of 2019 - mid 2021.. for some reason that seems like a distant memory...

Despite me still recommending to other people, I still have to point out the issues I have with this game,
I love Dead by Deadlight!  but things have to change.. devs please listen to the community.. please save it before this becomes another "Blizzard"

Well I'm solo q survivor main, then kinda curious is this patch seriously balanced?
So I started playing killer today after the patch, 3 times without losing every single survivor. The first thing I did, check how many gens, 7 for example (they need to fix 5, so 7-5 = 2 useless gens + 1 gen so the gate won't open = 3), then camp 3 nearest gens that close to each other, If no one there, find a survivor, DO NOT leave 3 gens too long, If you think It's too long, back to that gens, check it again. IF the gens that you want to camp almost fixed, break it then keep patrolling gens until they 'back to normal', find a survivor again then repeat. Happy winning every single game.

a

I wouldn't bother unless you're going to buy the DLCs.
The DLC characters are the best, especially the killers, some of them basically have no counters at all, so if you know what you're doing as the killer (which requires maybe 1 hr of game practice or less), you cannot be beaten.
Perhaps in some kind of scenario where all 4 survivors are playing together, know each other, and have a character/map strategy in play. They could win consistently. Otherwise, not really possible.
A lot of the people that play this are not very intelligent, they don't act tactically, don't hide properly, don't evade properly, so again, if the killer is even half way decent, then you are going to lose the game a lot.
It's bad enough where a lot of people don't even bother to try and help you off the hook, I find it's about 50/50 whether or not the first time I get hooked is a death sentence for the match.
Having friends helps, but no one plays this game like that any more where they're really trying to win so what ends up happening is a lot of AFK time for blood points meaning there's just no point really.

EDIT:I just played some more and really need to stress again that this game is extremely stupid with just the worst people.
Did you know that there is no way to communicate with your team in game?
No chat.
No voice.
ZERO WAYS TO COORDINATE.
Killers that have played for years and have every unlock are put against noobs that just started and have no unlocks. 
I think it's because almost no one plays the game.
The game also doesn't not give you ANY indication of what these abilities do. 
There is no in-game tool tip telling you what malice is applied to your character.
You just have to figure it out for yourself. The only way to find out in game is to play the killer and grind out the levels, discovering the information as you go. Naturally that will take you a few hundred hours to do.
You could also completely break the immersion and read about it on the internet all in hopes that it will give you a better chance. I'd imagine that's what most people do.

The biggest problem I'm having is this:
Half the matches are literally killers farming bloodpoints (in game EXP) and they do NOTHING. They are macro'd to attack in place so they don't get disconnected.
The other half of games are filled with trolls or idiots who actively sabotage you at worst, or don't do anything to help you.
All it takes is one survivor playing poorly to strongly throw the game.
Save your sanity.
DO NOT PLAY IT.
